title: The Blue Foot Zone
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include component:image-block | name=bluefoot.jpg | caption= literally me | width=300px]]

([*https://discord.gg/h5uY646BER blue foot fan club discord server (so you can be notified when I post)])

Hi there!

This is my author page. I write SCP articles, mostly. I like funny quick articles, gripping long articles, simple anomalies, creative ideas, and alternate dimension SCPs. I don't like excessively complicated anomalies and long descriptions and special containment procedures.
